Title: Night Light
Plot: After reading a story about the bogeyman, SpongeBob becomes scared of the dark, buying night lights in bulk. Patrick admits he is scared of the dark too. Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy come to the pineapple and say that there is nothing to be afraid of, after he flashes the Mermaid Man signal. But an enemy of Mermaid Man, known as The Moth, arrives. Mermaid Man has been pursuing him for more than 57 years, and attempts to defeat him. However, Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy are defeated. SpongeBob at
Writer: Casey Alexander, Chris Mitchell, Steven Banks
